website_summaries.verdict: A hutch that is built to last and will meet expectations in terms of sturdiness and ability to keep pets happy and safe.
pros: Great for rabbits and similar-sized pets such as guinea pigs
On the plus side, the hutch may be larger than expected, providing more room for pets to maneuver
Designed for indoor use but can be varnished for outdoor wear as well
cons: Does not come with a cleaning grate

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for rabbit
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit is chewing herself right through this cage and we've only had it a couple months. There's pretty significant damage due to her chewing, even though she has several other chew items in her cage. She exposed a nail and that caused a human injury because it wasn't noticed right away. Otherwise, the cage is very cute and sturdy. She loves having a little hideaway house and an area to be out in the open when she wants to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Steurer

customer_reviews.title: So darling!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be fooled by older reviews. As stated by the manufacturer, they have improved the product, and I can honestly say I have no complaints. It looks absolutely darling, the tray is easy to pull out, and there is no pee leaking. Only thing is that I wish that it came in a bigger size that wasn’t that odd triangular shape offered. This is tight for my two piggies and I will most likely need to get something bigger in the future.
customer_reviews.author: eva chiocchetti

customer_reviews.title: He'll spend most of his time in that small dark section
customer_reviews.text: Great hutch for a guinea pig. Attractive, functional, etc, but consider this - the floor of the covered section is wood (removable), and wood absorbs liquid and hold onto odors. Guinea pigs like to do their business in the dark, so this is a good place for a litter box. However, they also like to sleep in the covered dark section. My daughter's guinea pig ends up sleeping, pooping, and peeing all in that small space. I line it with pee pads, and he's litter trained, but I'm still concerned that he sleeps and spends so much time in a confined space with poop & ammonia odors (which can very quickly cause respiratory problems).
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Stay away cheap wood. Almost like it was made out of bark.
customer_reviews.text: Wood is so thin and is prone to breaking, recurved item damaged in several spots. Paid for it to be assembled asked for a partial refund for the damaged areas but was told to send back which will cost me more money to have the handyman come back out and disassembled it. Then wait for a new one and pay again for that one to be assembled if it’s not damaged as well. FYI- stay away from this cage, it’s cheap wood will break just with a little pressure junk.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly cute and so easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased! Very nice construction and packaging. Assembly was a breeze. The perfect indoor rabbit hutch for a special bunny. Easy access and easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Beware...Beautiful, but urine leaks out!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful but....wait for it... the tray slides in and out easily and my rabbit loves the sperate house part....but urine leaks out!!! We clean it every other day. We added high wooden blocks inside to stop the urine from leaking out on to the floor... didn't work. We tried more absorbent bedding, expensive bedding, newspaper, paper bags from the grocery store etc and no matter what we do, urine leaks out of the side and down the leg. It ruined my carpet and I'm tired of cleaning urine off my floor tile floor. I don't care how pretty it is. I'm throwing it out. Maybe this won't happen, with you rabbit...but it happened with mine. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amber D

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional rabbit house.
customer_reviews.text: This went together super easily. The bottom tray is plastic lines, so pee cannot leak out. Because of that, we’ve left this on our covered porch, knowing it won’t get ruined. It’s a very cute home for our rabbit. I love that the “house” part has a wood bottom. It’s easy to remove and out bunny never goes to the bathroom in his house, anyway. It’s just a thin material. That’s why I marked off on sturdiness. Not sure how long it will last. I feel sure it couldn’t set out in the weather/rain uncovered, as the roof isn’t adequate for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Mama

customer_reviews.title: Bad setup
customer_reviews.text: So I’m happy for the most part, however there is no mesh or wire in the main part of the cage that separates your rabbit from the pullout tray. Therefore you animal is sitting and stepping in it’s urine and feces. I’ve have rabbits my whole life and there should be a separation so when they go to the bathroom it drops below them and they are not forced to lay in it. Had to find mesh and make something on my own. For that reason I wouldn’t recommend this product unless you want to buy and add more pieces to it.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Cozy Rabbit Home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this home for a my neice's rabbit. I was able to put this together fairly easily. I was surprised and a bit concerned by how light weight the wood pieces are; however, once I got it all together it seemed pretty sturdy. It says in description it can fit 1-2 rabbits but I feel its only sufficient for one. It gets pretty tight when you add other things inside the cage. The waterproof pan seems to be well constructed - that I was pleased with. My niece's rabbit immediate hopped to the covered section - that seemed to be a big hit for her rabbit. Overall, it is a cute and cozy home for one small furry friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.text: I'm torn because I really like it and so does my rabbit but I was missing a pretty important piece that opened and closed the top hatch door. I contacted the seller about the piece, they said to send photos and I did and didn't hear anything back. So its all there and nice but the hatch doesn't function. Paid too much for it to have something wrong or of the box
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for Dwarf Netherland
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect purchase for my Netherland dwarf bunny, It went together in under an hour and together nicely. The smell that others have noted I smelt as well but it's the smell of the cedar wood honestly. I highly Recommend chew objects for your bunny in this so your hutch doesn't get all chewed up!! I wouldn't Recommend for full size bunny it would be rather cramped. I also wouldn't recommend it unless your animal is litter-box trained or you do wire across the tray because there's nothing separating the tray they walk on on there droppings/pee if they go anywhere in the hutch itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for Free Roam House Rabbits!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this product. Our house rabbit is 90% free roam so this is a great home base for her as it has room for her litter box and a small dark hide-away portion for her to sleep in at night. It's easy to clean and assemble . I do not recommend this if your bunny does not get to roam freely throughout the day as it would be WAY too small. It could be fine for dwarf breeds. I love that it's cute and fits well into our home aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Freed

customer_reviews.title: Great buy if the tray would stay in.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this, however, we have the hardest time trying to get the tray back in. It has to be 100 percent perfectly straight with the exact amount of pressure on both sides to slide in and not fall out.....once we came home and the bunny was just free in the back yard with our dogs. Luckily nothing happened
customer_reviews.author: zteacherC

customer_reviews.title: You just need a xl corner litter box
customer_reviews.text: Got a bunny for daughter for Christmas and knew I wanted to litter box train right away. You do not need a grate. What I did for the first few days to a week was put litter down on pull out and the litter box in the corner an xl corner one put hay feeder right over it and food bowl on it so he right away went to the bathroom there and now I do not need the litter all over and he has a bed and blanket down from 5 below. It has been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute bunny hut was very easy to put together all you need is a screwdriver. I had it together from time opening the box to fully together in about an hour. I am going to paint it to give it extra protection I dont think it would last real long in direct weather but under a carport or eave I believe it would do just fine. Tray is plastic so its easy to clean on the one I got.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Allstun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality, product arrived on time and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality, product arrived on time and as advertised, I use it for my guinea pig and he thinks he has a kingdom now. Some of the bedding will escape from the tray area as a result of your animal running around in the cage, but not a deal breaker we sweep daily anyway.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Try does leak
customer_reviews.text: This is a great home for our bunny. Only issue we are having is the wood for the inclosed floor doesn’t fit properly so we had to take it out so our bunny wouldn’t get hurt and the bottom tray has started to leak pee when he doesn’t use his litter box. So we have to place plastic on the floor so it doesn’t cause the carpet to get messed up. Wish the try was ticker to keep the bedding in the bottom when pulling the bottom out because it makes a mess when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: ashley bellamy

customer_reviews.title: Soft Wood
customer_reviews.text: While this beautiful rabbit hutch seems like a great buy, the wood is too soft and tempting. Even with toys my rabbit continued to chew every piece of wood reachable in the inside. The wood broke off easily which became a game for him. If you have a rabbit that loves to gnaw on things, this cage is not it.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Read measurements!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the cage. I didn't read the size, but thought for the price it would be big enough. Our bun seems so big in it. It came broken, but didn't take away from it. It would be great for small rabbits. It was super easy to assemble my young daughters put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Needs modification for wood chewing animals
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hutch for my two guinea pigs. I can see after one night that I will need to make modifications. They are eating the wood exposed on the inside of the hutch. Item also didn’t come with a piece advertised, the wire bottom to separate the pull out tray. This wasn’t a big deal though, I’ve just been using their regular fleece blanket. The video in the advertisement showed water being poured into the pull out tray. This is not possible with no wire bottom to hold the animal up out of the water. I plan on somehow covering the wood inside the hutch where they’ve eaten it. Otherwise, it’s BEAUTIFUL! I’m pleased. Just need to modify.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Easy to assemble and holds up well. The only downside is that the removable tray is the bottom of the cage, so you have to remove your critter before taking the tray out to clean. Not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for guinea pigs! Love this indoor hutch!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect indoor hutch for my daughter's two guinea pigs. It is both functional and aesthetically pleasing in her bedroom. It has a bottom drawer to pull put easily for cleaning. But the animals are not having to walk on wire caging. Other pull out cages we looked at they would be and this would not work for guinea pigs. I did a lot of searching and reviewing before purchasing and am not at all disappointed. Great product and price.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethA

customer_reviews.title: Easiest instructions & assembly
customer_reviews.text: We put this together in under an hour! The instructions are the easiest I’ve used that I can remember. I HATE reading instructions because they’re usually unclear and confusing. They even put the screws on a labeled card! When I say, I LOVED this assembly, I mean, I LOVED ASSEMBLING THIS CAGE! PROS: Very easy to assemble Sturdy Attractive CONS: I DON’T HAVE ANY! ENJOY!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Bunny loves her hutch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hutch! It was very easy to put together, it's easy to clean due to the pull out tray. It's very pretty and looks cute in my house. And it's a great size, big enough for the bunny to have room, but not too huge for inside my house. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SharonMay30

customer_reviews.title: Nice little hutch
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for our inside rabbits. Easy to assemble. Easy to clean. Rabbits love to chew on them though. May have to reinforce the legs cause one is almost chewed through.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty But Leaks and if Kept Inside Will Destroy Your Floors
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully made product but unfortunately, not working very well for us because there is no lip and clearly no seal on the tray as our rabbit's urine leaks out multiple times per day. I'd suggest putting it outside on a covered patio but with the wood/paint being left unsealed as well - that's not an option as it would clearly not handle humidity well at all. Considering the price I would buy it again, but if you so choose - be prepared to deal with leaking urine every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Tray does leak
customer_reviews.text: This tray does leak. I’ve had to buy two cat litter boxes and a mat to go under it. It’s very frustrating. It looks nice, it’s sturdy, and the bunnies like it. I just wish it didn’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Sellers Fam

customer_reviews.title: Nice rabbit hutch
customer_reviews.text: Nice rabbit hutch. Our rabbit weighs about 6 lbs and likes it. However he is chewing one wooden corner .
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: So Cute! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A screen was missing and we had to figure out how to make a make-shift bottom, but other than that, love it! It is cute and looks great in the yard as a home for our little critter!
customer_reviews.author: Starling Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Cute for inside
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! We have on screened porch because low to ground. Afraid dogs will push over and top will come open. Not real secure but very cute. We put three dwarf rabbits in it but it would be better with one or two. Really cute for inside of house
customer_reviews.author: Delta

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I am changing this to one star as the cage constantly leaks out my bunnies pee. I have to clean the floor three time a day. The bunny can also open the top door and jump out which is not safe as I have other animals and work during the day. It looks pretty but a waste of money as now I need to find a cage that works!
customer_reviews.author: flsun66

customer_reviews.title: Bunny is happy
customer_reviews.text: Great cage. I added casters to the bottom of the legs to make it easier to move. Very cute, but wouldn’t last long out in the elements. Inside or under a patio is good. I’m very pleased with this cage & would recommend it for a single rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyside

customer_reviews.title: Nice big chew toy for Bunnies/ Rabbits
customer_reviews.text: Please reconsider buying this beautiful expensive cage because bunnies/ rabbits EAT WOOD. Not very smart to have a soft wood cage to a wood chewing cute pet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cage that's easy to put together. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Parts all fit well. Only down side is door seems light. A very strong and determined rabbit could concievably press the door open. Add a caribiener for extra security. Arrived promptly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: A Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Cute cage but not practical design
customer_reviews.text: Nice cage... esthetically appealingly!! HOWEVER... huge downside of cage is there is no wire flooring above poop tray. The rabbit literally pees and poops on the level that he is in most of the day. His feet are dirty constantly bc of the Urine and stool.... very disappointed about this!
customer_reviews.author: kristi alcina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The hutch went together pretty easily with no issues. I had hoped that there was a cage barrier between the rabbit and the pull out tray but it will be easy enough to add one in.
customer_reviews.author: rex arbogast

customer_reviews.title: Removable tray isn't super great
customer_reviews.text: I had visioned a cage type floor where droppings would fall down into the removable tray. But the floor is the tray so the bunnies are hopping around in their droppings unless we clean out often. The shape and concept of the actual hutch is great though. We have 2 full size bunnies and it is plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: As described so cute. Just know bunnies chew on wood so if you get this you have to buy wood sticks or paint so the rabbit will not mess it up!

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. And worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. But due to it being wood, eventually my bunnies ate it and I had to dump it. But it was a cute piece in my apartment and easy to use, and easy for my children to handle too!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexanderia

customer_reviews.title: Rain is a problem!
customer_reviews.text: We were able to put this hutch together super quick and it is great to clean up after bunny. However, it isn’t very big and half of it is open on the top. I didn’t even think about it when I purchased, but it rains a lot here in the fall and the poor bunny got super wet the first day, and now we keep the top covered with another board. Kind of inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller breed rabbits!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my mini red bunny! Cute and stylish enough to where i can keep it inside my home and it goes with our decor. Recommend for the smaller breed animals
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: We Love our rabbit hutch
customer_reviews.text: We Love our rabbit hutch! It is exactly as pictured. It was very easy to assemble. Our rabbit, Delilah, loves it too. The sliding tray underneath makes it very easy to clean. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a hutch for their rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy this cage a lot. Wish there was a way for the poop to go in the tray without the bunny have to walk in its own poop. Other wise enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the coop on Thursday and it arrived Saturday. I opened and assembled it in a half hour. While it’s not a heavy duty outdoor type coop it ended up passing my expectations and we both can’t say enough good things about it. The only negative thing I could point out is that it’s not interchangeable; the gate and pan can only be installed/used on one side. Regardless, it’s a great coop and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Wondercheck

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit Hutch
customer_reviews.text: The hutch really is very nice. It smells of cedar and it was easy to put together. However I wish I had paid more attention to the measurements. It is a bit smaller than the one I have for outside. I use this one for inside and considering I was going to add a bunny I think it is much too small for 2 rabbits. I am trying to figure out how to make it bigger if I can find someone handy with building these sort of things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grows mold even when cleaned regularly
customer_reviews.text: Product is not good for animals...we had ours for only about six months when our guinea pig developed a fungus...turns out that mold/fungus was starting to grow on the underside of the wood between it and the pull out tray in the hutch side. We had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cox

customer_reviews.title: I have messy guinea pigs and it really needs something ...
customer_reviews.text: I have messy guinea pigs and it really needs something to put around edge to prevent my tornadoes from getting bedding everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Talbot

customer_reviews.title: This is not ideal
customer_reviews.text: The hutch is well made and nice to look at. The removable tray is a great benefit, however there should be a small wire grate above the tray so bunny can remain in hitch while cleaning. Also, when liter training when they poop or pee they are now in the mess as opposed to allowing the excriment to fall through grate onto tray they just sit in it. I assumed there was this grate already there but there isn’t so beware.
customer_reviews.author: R. Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: My chinchilla loves it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our new chinchilla and she loves it. The wood made it easy to add extra perches in the enclosed area, the 3 access areas make it easy to get to her, and the slide out bottom makes cleaning super easy. The smell is still strong but it's getting better as we air it out. Overall a good habitat, plus it's adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: For Hocus Pocus Master of Escaping
customer_reviews.text: My little blue lionhead bunny is the master of escaping. He chews his little heart out and destroys EVERYTHING! When i first put him in this new bunny home it was at that moment the jig was up! He’s been chewing on it for months and it hasn't budged. Its also so stinking cute!
customer_reviews.author: Keeyactta Smith

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, very cute and fit together well, I did have a hard time with the instructions, and the cage is much smaller than I thought for two guinea pigs.
customer_reviews.author: eric huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Bought for guinea pig
customer_reviews.text: My Guinea pig loves this cage. He has his own hiding area and play area.
customer_reviews.author: corine miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice rabbit cage.
customer_reviews.text: The cage was easy to put together. It would be a good size for a regular sized rabbit. It is a little small for my English lop as she is bigger. Still a very nice cage.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, easy to assemble. However I am not sure why the inside bottom floor are two removeable planks. This makes no sense to me. We are struggling to keep them clean and dry as the covered part is our guinea pig's favorite place to hang out....?
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: cute little hutch but i was installing the locking arm and the wood cracked. POS. not worth $140
customer_reviews.author: Doc Mom

customer_reviews.title: Happy Bunbun
customer_reviews.text: Bun likes to chew on sides now and then, but when I give him fresh vegetables he doesn’t. So I highly recommend this! My Bunbun loves it!!!!!!!!!! Puppy pads changed twice a day keeps it smelling great in doors. Don’t use bedding, keep your bunbun clean. No joke.... puppy pads twice a day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and works great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 12 & 6 year old sons for a rabbit. They both put it together with help. Really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Petsfit Rabbit Hutch
customer_reviews.text: Unable to put the hutch together this weekend because, we received 21 "C" screws but no "A" or "B" screws to assemble after ripping apart packing and locating more loose screws that were stamped w/"C" . No way to contact seller, or apparently the manufacturer. VERY disappointing with the whole experience after having paid decent money.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Gas strut works, just screw it in the pre-made holes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cage! Great for medium to large size rabbits! Putting it together was very easy. Instructions were not too complicated to understand. Only problem we had trouble with was the gas strut, but we figured it out fairly quick. Just had to screw it in place to “make it work” lol! Other than that, this cage is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kiandra

customer_reviews.title: Overall good bunny home
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble but once you get it together it is an awesome crate for your furry friend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ann Peyton

customer_reviews.title: It's very nice and it will be great for my fan tail ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice and it will be great for my fan tail pigeon. Very easy to put together as well. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: jereisha

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute---Easy to Assemble--my specific Bun didnt like it at all...maybe mines just picky?
customer_reviews.text: My bun preferred his metal folding dog crate..... was not thrilled when I placed him in this altough I though it was pretty cool :)
customer_reviews.author: Leta Marie DeMello

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together (which is most important) and came ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together (which is most important) and came packaged well without any damaged pieces (another key detail!) Our bunnies love it!!! Adorable, and well made. Ours will sit on a covered porch, so if yours will be out in the weather, you might consider sealing it first.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mia

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super easy assembly, absolutely perfect, just what we needed for our big bunny!
customer_reviews.author: itskritta

customer_reviews.title: Goof for Rabbit, bad for clean floors.
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this, however the biggest flaw is that the pan is difficult to get out with everything on it (in other words, you make a mess trying to remove the tray) and the lip around the outside is not high enough to prevent Little Bunny Foofoo from kicking out bedding. I plan on buying some guards to try to keep more of the material inside the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect cage for our very social Holland Lop
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cage for our very social Holland Lop. If he were a bigger breed though, I would definitely put two together. He is super happy. We leave the door open during the day when we are home so he can go in and out. He needed a little step to get in and out of the cage at first, but now he is fine. It is super easy to clean if your bunny is litter trained. Love this so much! Looks so much nicer in my house and he has a lot of room to play. I line the entire bottom with timothy grass and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: She happily hops back in when it is time
customer_reviews.text: Thumper loves her cage. She happily hops back in when it is time. My one big problem is she kicks her litter out.
customer_reviews.author: Lindamb305

customer_reviews.title: Prefabulous....
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I still can’t believe they shipped for free! Easy to assemble and it matches my home. Our baby bunny loves it..
customer_reviews.author: Nannad

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the cage leaks even after being cleaned
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was as described and was easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Clay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rabbit hutch
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit absolutely loves her new home! Big enough to roam around with privacy in the hutch when she gets startled. Easy to set up and very study. So many compliments of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: no base when you pull the tray out to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why the company wouldn't put a base under the tray. When you pull the tray out to clean the animal falls out of the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoors!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give my bunny an upgrade on a living space and he is so happy with it! I am training him to be a free roam but bought this as a hidey house and He loves relaxing inside. If you are thinking of doing what I did, make sure to purchase a ramp to make it easier for your bun to enter and exit.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Bodsford

customer_reviews.title: Great cage! I use this for my small tortoises ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cage! I use this for my small tortoises until they are large enough to go into the larger cages in the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bought for my bunnies
customer_reviews.text: this pen is perfect for 1-2 rabbits! i absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: brandie

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR Rabbits.
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful. Super easy to build but not recommend for rabbits. They destroyed the cage by chewing up the wood around the door and edges.
customer_reviews.author: AKF

customer_reviews.title: Wood wasn't painted
customer_reviews.text: The wood was NOT painted white, as pictured. The wood wasn't painted AT ALL. It was too much hassle to return it. But I am disappointed that the product was not as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: MsC

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly good design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and a great design. Only downside was the lid/roof is a bit difficult to attach and function
customer_reviews.author: Colton and Sara Chesney

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor bunny hutch
customer_reviews.text: I love this hutch! It's the perfect size for my bunny and it was really easy to put together. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: NYC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Rabbit Hutch!
customer_reviews.text: This hutch is fantastic! It was very easy to put together & directions were straightforward and easy to follow. My Holland Lop loves it! We use it as an indoor hutch only. I am so happy with this purchase & so is Mr. Biscuits!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gabbard

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Seal all openings around fencing and around the trays. Really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit loved her hutch. She keeps chewing the wood in the inside.
customer_reviews.author: anna morgunova

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: So we got this cage in March in April my bunny that was only 2 years old died because she was chewing the wood in the cage and its painted so its probably toxic. Now I have a dead bunny and a cage that I cant take back thanks
customer_reviews.author: Julie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Beautiful... but inside tray doesn't clean well. Overall satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love our new bunny house!
customer_reviews.text: Rabbit cage arrived very fast. Super easy to install and use. Our bunny loves her new house. Best part is, it’s so easy to clean my daughter does it on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s such an adorable cage and seems very good quality. Assemble was super easy, come with Allen wrench and I just used a Phillips screw driver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size is perfect for their small size
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our new family pet, 2 Holland lop bunnies. Size is perfect for their small size, the sliding tray makes cleaning a breeze, and the build instructions were very simple to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Dark1421

customer_reviews.title: Cool little home for my rabbit
customer_reviews.text: Cool little home for my rabbit, even thou it is too small for her and she has already chewed up the wood edges!
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Great cage Rabbit can still chew on wood on edge of cage. But she’s happy
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: 4 days into purchase and our bunnies have already very easily eaten through most of the wood! Very disappointed in the way this is made
customer_reviews.author: Billy diaz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hutch
customer_reviews.text: It opens 3 different ways which makes cleaning and catching bunnies super easy. Super easy to assemble. Took me 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Shipped on time
customer_reviews.text: The hutch arrived yesterday. Box in great condition. Packaging was neat and organized. Instructions were easy to understand. Took the advice of another buyer and used wood glue along with the screws reinforces it. The cedar lid is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Jones

customer_reviews.title: Urine runs down the sides.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the hutch is pretty but the pee just runs down the sides. Impossible to clean the wood. Wet soiled bedding gets stuck in between the wire and the wood. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Deseriee Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Three of the pieces were broken straight out of the box. Now dealing with the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: salsagirlatl

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Two pieces of wood came broken. The hardware to keep the lid up does not work. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Practically a Bunny Condo!!
customer_reviews.text: This hutch is PERFECT for our bunny girl :) So easy to put together and we can already tell that our Gimli is so much happier in this hutch than she was in the plastic bottom cheapo from the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Stephani Emerick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a bunny
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves it . Easy to clean . Not an eyesore in a room .
customer_reviews.author: Marleny

customer_reviews.title: Cage smells and leaks
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this cage. It leaked urine all through the cage and the feces gets caught in the wire. It had a constant smell as it soaked in the wood as well. I love the style but it’s just not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for more than one bunny.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality hutch and just the perfect size for a single bunny. Our bunny loves the indoor bunny house for when he gets sleepy. The smell is wonderful. Cedar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I tried assembling it and I followed the directions but it was a little difficult, also it keeps wobbling, it wont stand still.
customer_reviews.author: Lizett

product_meta.title: Petsfit Wood Rabbit Cage with Not Leakage Deeper Removable Tray, 38.2" L x 19.6" W x 33.8" H
feature_bullets: Large enough for 1-2 rabbits, guinea pigs, hamsters and other small animals and no weight limit
The tray is deeper than before and won’t leak off. Any problem with removable tray, Petsfit would send you replacement
Made of solid wood is not recommended to chewer and is good for indoor and no rain outdoor use
The roof on the wood side can lift up with piston hinge to stay up for easy cleaning
The side enclosed part can be used for sleeping room or bathroom; Easy to assemble with pre-drilled holes
